page.title: 06Farming
page.content:
This area is a good area for farming because there are plenty of hills, fields and land to keep sheep, cows and horses.
Some farms keep livestock, other farms grow crops, but most of the farms around here are mixed farms. The livestock kept is mostly cows, sheep and pigs and some have chickens and geese. The grass is very good for grazing because it rains a lot, especially in the spring time. Three boys in our class live on mixed farms. They grow crops, wheat and hay and have cows, sheep and pigs.
